02493             tp->link_config.orig_advertising = phydev->advertising;
02494 
02495             advertising = ADVERTISED_TP |
02496                       ADVERTISED_Pause |
02497                       ADVERTISED_Autoneg |
02498                       ADVERTISED_10baseT_Half;
02499 
02500             if ((tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_ENABLE_ASF) ||
02501                 device_should_wake) {
02502                 if (tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_WOL_SPEED_100MB)
02503                     advertising |=
02504                         ADVERTISED_100baseT_Half |
02505                         ADVERTISED_100baseT_Full |
02506                         ADVERTISED_10baseT_Full;
02507                 else
02508                     advertising |= ADVERTISED_10baseT_Full;
02509             }
02510 
02511             phydev->advertising = advertising;
02512 
02513             phy_start_aneg(phydev);
02514 
02515             phyid = phydev->drv->phy_id & phydev->drv->phy_id_mask;
02516             if (phyid != TG3_PHY_ID_BCMAC131) {
02517                 phyid &= TG3_PHY_OUI_MASK;
02518                 if (phyid == TG3_PHY_OUI_1 ||
02519                     phyid == TG3_PHY_OUI_2 ||
02520                     phyid == TG3_PHY_OUI_3)
02521                     do_low_power = true;
02522             }
02523         }
02524     } else {
02525         do_low_power = true;
02526 
02527         if (tp->link_config.phy_is_low_power == 0) {
02528             tp->link_config.phy_is_low_power = 1;
02529             tp->link_config.orig_speed = tp->link_config.speed;
02530             tp->link_config.orig_duplex = tp->link_config.duplex;
02531             tp->link_config.orig_autoneg = tp->link_config.autoneg;
02532         }
02533 
02534         if (!(tp->tg3_flags2 & TG3_FLG2_ANY_SERDES)) {
02535             tp->link_config.speed = SPEED_10;
02536             tp->link_config.duplex = DUPLEX_HALF;
02537             tp->link_config.autoneg = AUTONEG_ENABLE;
02538             tg3_setup_phy(tp, 0);
02539         }
02540     }
02541 
02542     if (GET_ASIC_REV(tp->pci_chip_rev_id) == ASIC_REV_5906) {
02543         u32 val;
02544 
02545         val = tr32(GRC_VCPU_EXT_CTRL);
02546         tw32(GRC_VCPU_EXT_CTRL, val | GRC_VCPU_EXT_CTRL_DISABLE_WOL);
02547     } else if (!(tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_ENABLE_ASF)) {
02548         int i;
02549         u32 val;
02550 
02551         for (i = 0; i < 200; i++) {
02552             tg3_read_mem(tp, NIC_SRAM_FW_ASF_STATUS_MBOX, &val);
02553             if (val == ~NIC_SRAM_FIRMWARE_MBOX_MAGIC1)
02554                 break;
02555             msleep(1);
02556         }
02557     }
02558     if (tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_WOL_CAP)
02559         tg3_write_mem(tp, NIC_SRAM_WOL_MBOX, WOL_SIGNATURE |
02560                              WOL_DRV_STATE_SHUTDOWN |
02561                              WOL_DRV_WOL |
02562                              WOL_SET_MAGIC_PKT);
02563 
02564     if (device_should_wake) {
02565         u32 mac_mode;
02566 
02567         if (!(tp->tg3_flags2 & TG3_FLG2_PHY_SERDES)) {
02568             if (do_low_power) {
02569                 tg3_writephy(tp, MII_TG3_AUX_CTRL, 0x5a);
02570                 udelay(40);
02571             }
02572 
02573             if (tp->tg3_flags2 & TG3_FLG2_MII_SERDES)
02574                 mac_mode = MAC_MODE_PORT_MODE_GMII;
02575             else
02576                 mac_mode = MAC_MODE_PORT_MODE_MII;
02577 
02578             mac_mode |= tp->mac_mode & MAC_MODE_LINK_POLARITY;
02579             if (GET_ASIC_REV(tp->pci_chip_rev_id) ==
02580                 ASIC_REV_5700) {
02581                 u32 speed = (tp->tg3_flags &
02582                          TG3_FLAG_WOL_SPEED_100MB) ?
02583                          SPEED_100 : SPEED_10;
02584                 if (tg3_5700_link_polarity(tp, speed))
02585                     mac_mode |= MAC_MODE_LINK_POLARITY;
02586                 else
02587                     mac_mode &= ~MAC_MODE_LINK_POLARITY;
02588             }
02589         } else {
02590             mac_mode = MAC_MODE_PORT_MODE_TBI;
02591         }
02592 
02593         if (!(tp->tg3_flags2 & TG3_FLG2_5750_PLUS))
02594             tw32(MAC_LED_CTRL, tp->led_ctrl);
02595 
02596         mac_mode |= MAC_MODE_MAGIC_PKT_ENABLE;
02597         if (((tp->tg3_flags2 & TG3_FLG2_5705_PLUS) &&
02598             !(tp->tg3_flags2 & TG3_FLG2_5780_CLASS)) &&
02599             ((tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_ENABLE_ASF) ||
02600              (tp->tg3_flags3 & TG3_FLG3_ENABLE_APE)))
02601             mac_mode |= MAC_MODE_KEEP_FRAME_IN_WOL;
02602 
02603         if (tp->tg3_flags3 & TG3_FLG3_ENABLE_APE) {
02604             mac_mode |= tp->mac_mode &
02605                     (MAC_MODE_APE_TX_EN | MAC_MODE_APE_RX_EN);
02606             if (mac_mode & MAC_MODE_APE_TX_EN)
02607                 mac_mode |= MAC_MODE_TDE_ENABLE;
02608         }
02609 
02610         tw32_f(MAC_MODE, mac_mode);
02611         udelay(100);
02612 
02613         tw32_f(MAC_RX_MODE, RX_MODE_ENABLE);
02614         udelay(10);
02615     }
02616 
02617     if (!(tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_WOL_SPEED_100MB) &&
02618         (GET_ASIC_REV(tp->pci_chip_rev_id) == ASIC_REV_5700 ||
02619          GET_ASIC_REV(tp->pci_chip_rev_id) == ASIC_REV_5701)) {
02620         u32 base_val;
02621 
02622         base_val = tp->pci_clock_ctrl;
02623         base_val |= (CLOCK_CTRL_RXCLK_DISABLE |
02624                  CLOCK_CTRL_TXCLK_DISABLE);
02625 
02626         tw32_wait_f(TG3PCI_CLOCK_CTRL, base_val | CLOCK_CTRL_ALTCLK |
02627                 CLOCK_CTRL_PWRDOWN_PLL133, 40);
02628     } else if ((tp->tg3_flags2 & TG3_FLG2_5780_CLASS) ||
02629            (tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_CPMU_PRESENT) ||
02630            (GET_ASIC_REV(tp->pci_chip_rev_id) == ASIC_REV_5906)) {
02631         /* do nothing */
02632     } else if (!((tp->tg3_flags2 & TG3_FLG2_5750_PLUS) &&
02633              (tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_ENABLE_ASF))) {
02634         u32 newbits1, newbits2;
02635 
02636         if (GET_ASIC_REV(tp->pci_chip_rev_id) == ASIC_REV_5700 ||
02637             GET_ASIC_REV(tp->pci_chip_rev_id) == ASIC_REV_5701) {
02638             newbits1 = (CLOCK_CTRL_RXCLK_DISABLE |
02639                     CLOCK_CTRL_TXCLK_DISABLE |
02640                     CLOCK_CTRL_ALTCLK);
02641             newbits2 = newbits1 | CLOCK_CTRL_44MHZ_CORE;
02642         } else if (tp->tg3_flags2 & TG3_FLG2_5705_PLUS) {
02643             newbits1 = CLOCK_CTRL_625_CORE;
02644             newbits2 = newbits1 | CLOCK_CTRL_ALTCLK;
02645         } else {
02646             newbits1 = CLOCK_CTRL_ALTCLK;
02647             newbits2 = newbits1 | CLOCK_CTRL_44MHZ_CORE;
02648         }
02649 
02650         tw32_wait_f(TG3PCI_CLOCK_CTRL, tp->pci_clock_ctrl | newbits1,
02651                 40);
02652 
02653         tw32_wait_f(TG3PCI_CLOCK_CTRL, tp->pci_clock_ctrl | newbits2,
02654                 40);
02655 
02656         if (!(tp->tg3_flags2 & TG3_FLG2_5705_PLUS)) {
02657             u32 newbits3;
02658 
02659             if (GET_ASIC_REV(tp->pci_chip_rev_id) == ASIC_REV_5700 ||
02660                 GET_ASIC_REV(tp->pci_chip_rev_id) == ASIC_REV_5701) {
02661                 newbits3 = (CLOCK_CTRL_RXCLK_DISABLE |
02662                         CLOCK_CTRL_TXCLK_DISABLE |
02663                         CLOCK_CTRL_44MHZ_CORE);
02664             } else {
02665                 newbits3 = CLOCK_CTRL_44MHZ_CORE;
02666             }
02667 
02668             tw32_wait_f(TG3PCI_CLOCK_CTRL,
02669                     tp->pci_clock_ctrl | newbits3, 40);
02670         }
02671     }
02672 
02673     if (!(device_should_wake) &&
02674         !(tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_ENABLE_ASF))
02675         tg3_power_down_phy(tp, do_low_power);
02676 
02677     tg3_frob_aux_power(tp);
02678 
02679     /* Workaround for unstable PLL clock */
02680     if ((GET_CHIP_REV(tp->pci_chip_rev_id) == CHIPREV_5750_AX) ||
02681         (GET_CHIP_REV(tp->pci_chip_rev_id) == CHIPREV_5750_BX)) {
02682         u32 val = tr32(0x7d00);
02683 
02684         val &= ~((1 << 16) | (1 << 4) | (1 << 2) | (1 << 1) | 1);
02685         tw32(0x7d00, val);
02686         if (!(tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_ENABLE_ASF)) {
02687             int err;
02688 
02689             err = tg3_nvram_lock(tp);
02690             tg3_halt_cpu(tp, RX_CPU_BASE);
02691             if (!err)
02692                 tg3_nvram_unlock(tp);
02693         }
02694     }
02695 
02696     tg3_write_sig_post_reset(tp, RESET_KIND_SHUTDOWN);
02697 
02698     if (device_should_wake)
02699         pci_enable_wake(tp->pdev, state, true);
02700 
02701     /* Finally, set the new power state. */
02702     pci_set_power_state(tp->pdev, state);
02703 
02704     return 0;
02705 }
02706 
02707 static void tg3_aux_stat_to_speed_duplex(struct tg3 *tp, u32 val, u16 *speed, u8 *duplex)
02708 {
02709     switch (val & MII_TG3_AUX_STAT_SPDMASK) {
02710     case MII_TG3_AUX_STAT_10HALF:
02711         *speed = SPEED_10;
02712         *duplex = DUPLEX_HALF;
02713         break;
02714 
02715     case MII_TG3_AUX_STAT_10FULL:
02716         *speed = SPEED_10;
02717         *duplex = DUPLEX_FULL;
02718         break;
02719 
02720     case MII_TG3_AUX_STAT_100HALF:
02721         *speed = SPEED_100;
02722         *duplex = DUPLEX_HALF;
02723         break;
02724 
02725     case MII_TG3_AUX_STAT_100FULL:
02726         *speed = SPEED_100;
02727         *duplex = DUPLEX_FULL;
02728         break;
02729 
02730     case MII_TG3_AUX_STAT_1000HALF:
02731         *speed = SPEED_1000;
02732         *duplex = DUPLEX_HALF;
02733         break;
02734 
02735     case MII_TG3_AUX_STAT_1000FULL:
02736         *speed = SPEED_1000;
02737         *duplex = DUPLEX_FULL;
02738         break;
02739 
02740     default:
02741         if (tp->tg3_flags3 & TG3_FLG3_PHY_IS_FET) {
02742             *speed = (val & MII_TG3_AUX_STAT_100) ? SPEED_100 :
02743                  SPEED_10;
02744             *duplex = (val & MII_TG3_AUX_STAT_FULL) ? DUPLEX_FULL :
02745                   DUPLEX_HALF;
02746             break;
02747         }
02748         *speed = SPEED_INVALID;
02749         *duplex = DUPLEX_INVALID;
02750         break;
02751     }
02752 }
02753 
02754 static void tg3_phy_copper_begin(struct tg3 *tp)
02755 {
02756     u32 new_adv;
02757     int i;
02758 
02759     if (tp->link_config.phy_is_low_power) {
02760         /* Entering low power mode.  Disable gigabit and
02761          * 100baseT advertisements.
02762          */
02763         tg3_writephy(tp, MII_TG3_CTRL, 0);
02764 
02765         new_adv = (ADVERTISE_10HALF | ADVERTISE_10FULL |
02766                ADVERTISE_CSMA | ADVERTISE_PAUSE_CAP);
02767         if (tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_WOL_SPEED_100MB)
02768             new_adv |= (ADVERTISE_100HALF | ADVERTISE_100FULL);
02769 
02770         tg3_writephy(tp, MII_ADVERTISE, new_adv);
02771     } else if (tp->link_config.speed == SPEED_INVALID) {
02772         if (tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_10_100_ONLY)
02773             tp->link_config.advertising &=
02774                 ~(ADVERTISED_1000baseT_Half |
02775                   ADVERTISED_1000baseT_Full);
02776 
02777         new_adv = ADVERTISE_CSMA;
02778         if (tp->link_config.advertising & ADVERTISED_10baseT_Half)
02779             new_adv |= ADVERTISE_10HALF;
02780         if (tp->link_config.advertising & ADVERTISED_10baseT_Full)
02781             new_adv |= ADVERTISE_10FULL;
02782         if (tp->link_config.advertising & ADVERTISED_100baseT_Half)
02783             new_adv |= ADVERTISE_100HALF;
02784         if (tp->link_config.advertising & ADVERTISED_100baseT_Full)
02785             new_adv |= ADVERTISE_100FULL;
02786 
02787         new_adv |= tg3_advert_flowctrl_1000T(tp->link_config.flowctrl);
02788 
02789         tg3_writephy(tp, MII_ADVERTISE, new_adv);
02790 
02791         if (tp->link_config.advertising &
02792             (ADVERTISED_1000baseT_Half | ADVERTISED_1000baseT_Full)) {
02793             new_adv = 0;
02794             if (tp->link_config.advertising & ADVERTISED_1000baseT_Half)
02795                 new_adv |= MII_TG3_CTRL_ADV_1000_HALF;
02796             if (tp->link_config.advertising & ADVERTISED_1000baseT_Full)
02797                 new_adv |= MII_TG3_CTRL_ADV_1000_FULL;
02798             if (!(tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_10_100_ONLY) &&
02799                 (tp->pci_chip_rev_id == CHIPREV_ID_5701_A0 ||
02800                  tp->pci_chip_rev_id == CHIPREV_ID_5701_B0))
02801                 new_adv |= (MII_TG3_CTRL_AS_MASTER |
02802                         MII_TG3_CTRL_ENABLE_AS_MASTER);
02803             tg3_writephy(tp, MII_TG3_CTRL, new_adv);
02804         } else {
02805             tg3_writephy(tp, MII_TG3_CTRL, 0);
02806         }
02807     } else {
02808         new_adv = tg3_advert_flowctrl_1000T(tp->link_config.flowctrl);
02809         new_adv |= ADVERTISE_CSMA;
02810 
02811         /* Asking for a specific link mode. */
02812         if (tp->link_config.speed == SPEED_1000) {
02813             tg3_writephy(tp, MII_ADVERTISE, new_adv);
02814 
02815             if (tp->link_config.duplex == DUPLEX_FULL)
02816                 new_adv = MII_TG3_CTRL_ADV_1000_FULL;
02817             else
02818                 new_adv = MII_TG3_CTRL_ADV_1000_HALF;
02819             if (tp->pci_chip_rev_id == CHIPREV_ID_5701_A0 ||
02820                 tp->pci_chip_rev_id == CHIPREV_ID_5701_B0)
02821                 new_adv |= (MII_TG3_CTRL_AS_MASTER |
02822                         MII_TG3_CTRL_ENABLE_AS_MASTER);
02823         } else {
02824             if (tp->link_config.speed == SPEED_100) {
02825                 if (tp->link_config.duplex == DUPLEX_FULL)
02826                     new_adv |= ADVERTISE_100FULL;
02827                 else
02828                     new_adv |= ADVERTISE_100HALF;
02829             } else {
02830                 if (tp->link_config.duplex == DUPLEX_FULL)
02831                     new_adv |= ADVERTISE_10FULL;
02832                 else
02833                     new_adv |= ADVERTISE_10HALF;
02834             }
02835             tg3_writephy(tp, MII_ADVERTISE, new_adv);
02836 
02837             new_adv = 0;
02838         }
02839 
02840         tg3_writephy(tp, MII_TG3_CTRL, new_adv);
02841     }
02842 
02843     if (tp->link_config.autoneg == AUTONEG_DISABLE &&
02844         tp->link_config.speed != SPEED_INVALID) {
02845         u32 bmcr, orig_bmcr;
02846 
02847         tp->link_config.active_speed = tp->link_config.speed;
02848         tp->link_config.active_duplex = tp->link_config.duplex;
02849 
02850         bmcr = 0;
02851         switch (tp->link_config.speed) {
02852         default:
02853         case SPEED_10:
02854             break;
02855 
02856         case SPEED_100:
02857             bmcr |= BMCR_SPEED100;
02858             break;
02859 
02860         case SPEED_1000:
02861             bmcr |= TG3_BMCR_SPEED1000;
02862             break;
02863         }
02864 
02865         if (tp->link_config.duplex == DUPLEX_FULL)
02866             bmcr |= BMCR_FULLDPLX;
02867 
02868         if (!tg3_readphy(tp, MII_BMCR, &orig_bmcr) &&
02869             (bmcr != orig_bmcr)) {
02870             tg3_writephy(tp, MII_BMCR, BMCR_LOOPBACK);
02871             for (i = 0; i < 1500; i++) {
02872                 u32 tmp;
02873 
02874                 udelay(10);
02875                 if (tg3_readphy(tp, MII_BMSR, &tmp) ||
02876                     tg3_readphy(tp, MII_BMSR, &tmp))
02877                     continue;
02878                 if (!(tmp & BMSR_LSTATUS)) {
02879                     udelay(40);
02880                     break;
02881                 }
02882             }
02883             tg3_writephy(tp, MII_BMCR, bmcr);
02884             udelay(40);
02885         }
02886     } else {
02887         tg3_writephy(tp, MII_BMCR,
02888                  BMCR_ANENABLE | BMCR_ANRESTART);
02889     }
02890 }
02891 
02892 static int tg3_init_5401phy_dsp(struct tg3 *tp)
02893 {
02894     int err;
02895 
02896     /* Turn off tap power management. */
02897     /* Set Extended packet length bit */
02898     err  = tg3_writephy(tp, MII_TG3_AUX_CTRL, 0x4c20);
02899 
02900     err |= tg3_writephy(tp, MII_TG3_DSP_ADDRESS, 0x0012);
02901     err |= tg3_writephy(tp, MII_TG3_DSP_RW_PORT, 0x1804);
02902 
02903     err |= tg3_writephy(tp, MII_TG3_DSP_ADDRESS, 0x0013);
02904     err |= tg3_writephy(tp, MII_TG3_DSP_RW_PORT, 0x1204);
02905 
02906     err |= tg3_writephy(tp, MII_TG3_DSP_ADDRESS, 0x8006);
02907     err |= tg3_writephy(tp, MII_TG3_DSP_RW_PORT, 0x0132);
02908 
02909     err |= tg3_writephy(tp, MII_TG3_DSP_ADDRESS, 0x8006);
02910     err |= tg3_writephy(tp, MII_TG3_DSP_RW_PORT, 0x0232);
02911 
02912     err |= tg3_writephy(tp, MII_TG3_DSP_ADDRESS, 0x201f);
02913     err |= tg3_writephy(tp, MII_TG3_DSP_RW_PORT, 0x0a20);
02914 
02915     udelay(40);
02916 
02917     return err;
02918 }
02919 
02920 static int tg3_copper_is_advertising_all(struct tg3 *tp, u32 mask)
02921 {
02922     u32 adv_reg, all_mask = 0;
02923 
02924     if (mask & ADVERTISED_10baseT_Half)
02925         all_mask |= ADVERTISE_10HALF;
02926     if (mask & ADVERTISED_10baseT_Full)
02927         all_mask |= ADVERTISE_10FULL;
02928     if (mask & ADVERTISED_100baseT_Half)
02929         all_mask |= ADVERTISE_100HALF;
02930     if (mask & ADVERTISED_100baseT_Full)
02931         all_mask |= ADVERTISE_100FULL;
02932 
02933     if (tg3_readphy(tp, MII_ADVERTISE, &adv_reg))
02934         return 0;
02935 
02936     if ((adv_reg & all_mask) != all_mask)
02937         return 0;
02938     if (!(tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_10_100_ONLY)) {
02939         u32 tg3_ctrl;
02940 
02941         all_mask = 0;
02942         if (mask & ADVERTISED_1000baseT_Half)
02943             all_mask |= ADVERTISE_1000HALF;
02944         if (mask & ADVERTISED_1000baseT_Full)
02945             all_mask |= ADVERTISE_1000FULL;
02946 
02947         if (tg3_readphy(tp, MII_TG3_CTRL, &tg3_ctrl))
02948             return 0;
02949 
02950         if ((tg3_ctrl & all_mask) != all_mask)
02951             return 0;
02952     }
02953     return 1;
02954 }
02955 
02956 static int tg3_adv_1000T_flowctrl_ok(struct tg3 *tp, u32 *lcladv, u32 *rmtadv)
02957 {
02958     u32 curadv, reqadv;
02959 
02960     if (tg3_readphy(tp, MII_ADVERTISE, lcladv))
02961         return 1;
02962 
02963     curadv = *lcladv & (ADVERTISE_PAUSE_CAP | ADVERTISE_PAUSE_ASYM);
02964     reqadv = tg3_advert_flowctrl_1000T(tp->link_config.flowctrl);
02965 
02966     if (tp->link_config.active_duplex == DUPLEX_FULL) {
02967         if (curadv != reqadv)
02968             return 0;
02969 
02970         if (tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_PAUSE_AUTONEG)
02971             tg3_readphy(tp, MII_LPA, rmtadv);
02972     } else {
02973         /* Reprogram the advertisement register, even if it
02974          * does not affect the current link.  If the link
02975          * gets renegotiated in the future, we can save an
02976          * additional renegotiation cycle by advertising
02977          * it correctly in the first place.
02978          */
02979         if (curadv != reqadv) {
02980             *lcladv &= ~(ADVERTISE_PAUSE_CAP |
02981                      ADVERTISE_PAUSE_ASYM);
02982             tg3_writephy(tp, MII_ADVERTISE, *lcladv | reqadv);
02983         }
02984     }
02985 
02986     return 1;
02987 }
02988 
02989 static int tg3_setup_copper_phy(struct tg3 *tp, int force_reset)
02990 {
02991     int current_link_up;
02992     u32 bmsr, dummy;
02993     u32 lcl_adv, rmt_adv;
02994     u16 current_speed;
02995     u8 current_duplex;
02996     int i, err;
02997 
02998     tw32(MAC_EVENT, 0);
02999 
03000     tw32_f(MAC_STATUS,
03001          (MAC_STATUS_SYNC_CHANGED |
03002           MAC_STATUS_CFG_CHANGED |
03003           MAC_STATUS_MI_COMPLETION |
03004           MAC_STATUS_LNKSTATE_CHANGED));
03005     udelay(40);
03006 
03007     if ((tp->mi_mode & MAC_MI_MODE_AUTO_POLL) != 0) {
03008         tw32_f(MAC_MI_MODE,
03009              (tp->mi_mode & ~MAC_MI_MODE_AUTO_POLL));
03010         udelay(80);
03011     }
03012 
03013     tg3_writephy(tp, MII_TG3_AUX_CTRL, 0x02);
03014 
03015     /* Some third-party PHYs need to be reset on link going
03016      * down.
03017      */
03018     if ((GET_ASIC_REV(tp->pci_chip_rev_id) == ASIC_REV_5703 ||
03019          GET_ASIC_REV(tp->pci_chip_rev_id) == ASIC_REV_5704 ||
03020          GET_ASIC_REV(tp->pci_chip_rev_id) == ASIC_REV_5705) &&
03021         netif_carrier_ok(tp->dev)) {
03022         tg3_readphy(tp, MII_BMSR, &bmsr);
03023         if (!tg3_readphy(tp, MII_BMSR, &bmsr) &&
03024             !(bmsr & BMSR_LSTATUS))
03025             force_reset = 1;
03026     }
03027     if (force_reset)
03028         tg3_phy_reset(tp);
03029 
03030     if ((tp->phy_id & PHY_ID_MASK) == PHY_ID_BCM5401) {
03031         tg3_readphy(tp, MII_BMSR, &bmsr);
03032         if (tg3_readphy(tp, MII_BMSR, &bmsr) ||
03033             !(tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_INIT_COMPLETE))
03034             bmsr = 0;
03035 
03036         if (!(bmsr & BMSR_LSTATUS)) {
03037             err = tg3_init_5401phy_dsp(tp);
03038             if (err)
03039                 return err;
03040 
03041             tg3_readphy(tp, MII_BMSR, &bmsr);
03042             for (i = 0; i < 1000; i++) {
03043                 udelay(10);
03044                 if (!tg3_readphy(tp, MII_BMSR, &bmsr) &&
03045                     (bmsr & BMSR_LSTATUS)) {
03046                     udelay(40);
03047                     break;
03048                 }
03049             }
03050 
03051             if ((tp->phy_id & PHY_ID_REV_MASK) == PHY_REV_BCM5401_B0 &&
03052                 !(bmsr & BMSR_LSTATUS) &&
03053                 tp->link_config.active_speed == SPEED_1000) {
03054                 err = tg3_phy_reset(tp);
03055                 if (!err)
03056                     err = tg3_init_5401phy_dsp(tp);
03057                 if (err)
03058                     return err;
03059             }
03060         }
03061     } else if (tp->pci_chip_rev_id == CHIPREV_ID_5701_A0 ||
03062            tp->pci_chip_rev_id == CHIPREV_ID_5701_B0) {
03063         /* 5701 {A0,B0} CRC bug workaround */
03064         tg3_writephy(tp, 0x15, 0x0a75);
03065         tg3_writephy(tp, 0x1c, 0x8c68);
03066         tg3_writephy(tp, 0x1c, 0x8d68);
03067         tg3_writephy(tp, 0x1c, 0x8c68);
03068     }
03069 
03070     /* Clear pending interrupts... */
03071     tg3_readphy(tp, MII_TG3_ISTAT, &dummy);
03072     tg3_readphy(tp, MII_TG3_ISTAT, &dummy);
03073 
03074     if (tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_USE_MI_INTERRUPT)
03075         tg3_writephy(tp, MII_TG3_IMASK, ~MII_TG3_INT_LINKCHG);
03076     else if (!(tp->tg3_flags3 & TG3_FLG3_PHY_IS_FET))
03077         tg3_writephy(tp, MII_TG3_IMASK, ~0);
03078 
03079     if (GET_ASIC_REV(tp->pci_chip_rev_id) == ASIC_REV_5700 ||
03080         GET_ASIC_REV(tp->pci_chip_rev_id) == ASIC_REV_5701) {
03081         if (tp->led_ctrl == LED_CTRL_MODE_PHY_1)
03082             tg3_writephy(tp, MII_TG3_EXT_CTRL,
03083                      MII_TG3_EXT_CTRL_LNK3_LED_MODE);
03084         else
03085             tg3_writephy(tp, MII_TG3_EXT_CTRL, 0);
03086     }
03087 
03088     current_link_up = 0;
03089     current_speed = SPEED_INVALID;
03090     current_duplex = DUPLEX_INVALID;
03091 
03092     if (tp->tg3_flags2 & TG3_FLG2_CAPACITIVE_COUPLING) {
03093         u32 val;
03094 
03095         tg3_writephy(tp, MII_TG3_AUX_CTRL, 0x4007);
03096         tg3_readphy(tp, MII_TG3_AUX_CTRL, &val);
03097         if (!(val & (1 << 10))) {
03098             val |= (1 << 10);
03099             tg3_writephy(tp, MII_TG3_AUX_CTRL, val);
03100             goto relink;
03101         }
03102     }
03103 
03104     bmsr = 0;
03105     for (i = 0; i < 100; i++) {
03106         tg3_readphy(tp, MII_BMSR, &bmsr);
03107         if (!tg3_readphy(tp, MII_BMSR, &bmsr) &&
03108             (bmsr & BMSR_LSTATUS))
03109             break;
03110         udelay(40);
03111     }
03112 
03113     if (bmsr & BMSR_LSTATUS) {
03114         u32 aux_stat, bmcr;
03115 
03116         tg3_readphy(tp, MII_TG3_AUX_STAT, &aux_stat);
03117         for (i = 0; i < 2000; i++) {
03118             udelay(10);
03119             if (!tg3_readphy(tp, MII_TG3_AUX_STAT, &aux_stat) &&
03120                 aux_stat)
03121                 break;
03122         }
03123 
03124         tg3_aux_stat_to_speed_duplex(tp, aux_stat,
03125                          &current_speed,
03126                          &current_duplex);
03127 
03128         bmcr = 0;
03129         for (i = 0; i < 200; i++) {
03130             tg3_readphy(tp, MII_BMCR, &bmcr);
03131             if (tg3_readphy(tp, MII_BMCR, &bmcr))
03132                 continue;
03133             if (bmcr && bmcr != 0x7fff)
03134                 break;
03135             udelay(10);
03136         }
03137 
03138         lcl_adv = 0;
03139         rmt_adv = 0;
03140 
03141         tp->link_config.active_speed = current_speed;
03142         tp->link_config.active_duplex = current_duplex;
03143 
03144         if (tp->link_config.autoneg == AUTONEG_ENABLE) {
03145             if ((bmcr & BMCR_ANENABLE) &&
03146                 tg3_copper_is_advertising_all(tp,
03147                         tp->link_config.advertising)) {
03148                 if (tg3_adv_1000T_flowctrl_ok(tp, &lcl_adv,
03149                                   &rmt_adv))
03150                     current_link_up = 1;
03151             }
03152         } else {
03153             if (!(bmcr & BMCR_ANENABLE) &&
03154                 tp->link_config.speed == current_speed &&
03155                 tp->link_config.duplex == current_duplex &&
03156                 tp->link_config.flowctrl ==
03157                 tp->link_config.active_flowctrl) {
03158                 current_link_up = 1;
03159             }
03160         }
03161 
03162         if (current_link_up == 1 &&
03163             tp->link_config.active_duplex == DUPLEX_FULL)
03164             tg3_setup_flow_control(tp, lcl_adv, rmt_adv);
03165     }
03166 
03167 relink:
03168     if (current_link_up == 0 || tp->link_config.phy_is_low_power) {
03169         u32 tmp;
03170 
03171         tg3_phy_copper_begin(tp);
03172 
03173         tg3_readphy(tp, MII_BMSR, &tmp);
03174         if (!tg3_readphy(tp, MII_BMSR, &tmp) &&
03175             (tmp & BMSR_LSTATUS))
03176             current_link_up = 1;
03177     }
03178 
03179     tp->mac_mode &= ~MAC_MODE_PORT_MODE_MASK;
03180     if (current_link_up == 1) {
03181         if (tp->link_config.active_speed == SPEED_100 ||
03182             tp->link_config.active_speed == SPEED_10)
03183             tp->mac_mode |= MAC_MODE_PORT_MODE_MII;
03184         else
03185             tp->mac_mode |= MAC_MODE_PORT_MODE_GMII;
03186     } else if (tp->tg3_flags3 & TG3_FLG3_PHY_IS_FET)
03187         tp->mac_mode |= MAC_MODE_PORT_MODE_MII;
03188     else
03189         tp->mac_mode |= MAC_MODE_PORT_MODE_GMII;
03190 
03191     tp->mac_mode &= ~MAC_MODE_HALF_DUPLEX;
03192     if (tp->link_config.active_duplex == DUPLEX_HALF)
03193         tp->mac_mode |= MAC_MODE_HALF_DUPLEX;
03194 
03195     if (GET_ASIC_REV(tp->pci_chip_rev_id) == ASIC_REV_5700) {
03196         if (current_link_up == 1 &&
03197             tg3_5700_link_polarity(tp, tp->link_config.active_speed))
03198             tp->mac_mode |= MAC_MODE_LINK_POLARITY;
03199         else
03200             tp->mac_mode &= ~MAC_MODE_LINK_POLARITY;
03201     }
03202 
03203     /* ??? Without this setting Netgear GA302T PHY does not
03204      * ??? send/receive packets...
03205      */
03206     if ((tp->phy_id & PHY_ID_MASK) == PHY_ID_BCM5411 &&
03207         tp->pci_chip_rev_id == CHIPREV_ID_5700_ALTIMA) {
03208         tp->mi_mode |= MAC_MI_MODE_AUTO_POLL;
03209         tw32_f(MAC_MI_MODE, tp->mi_mode);
03210         udelay(80);
03211     }
03212 
03213     tw32_f(MAC_MODE, tp->mac_mode);
03214     udelay(40);
03215 
03216     if (tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_USE_LINKCHG_REG) {
03217         /* Polled via timer. */
03218         tw32_f(MAC_EVENT, 0);
03219     } else {
03220         tw32_f(MAC_EVENT, MAC_EVENT_LNKSTATE_CHANGED);
03221     }
03222     udelay(40);
03223 
03224     if (GET_ASIC_REV(tp->pci_chip_rev_id) == ASIC_REV_5700 &&
03225         current_link_up == 1 &&
03226         tp->link_config.active_speed == SPEED_1000 &&
03227         ((tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_PCIX_MODE) ||
03228          (tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_PCI_HIGH_SPEED))) {
03229         udelay(120);
03230         tw32_f(MAC_STATUS,
03231              (MAC_STATUS_SYNC_CHANGED |
03232               MAC_STATUS_CFG_CHANGED));
03233         udelay(40);
03234         tg3_write_mem(tp,
03235                   NIC_SRAM_FIRMWARE_MBOX,
03236                   NIC_SRAM_FIRMWARE_MBOX_MAGIC2);
03237     }
03238 
03239     /* Prevent send BD corruption. */
03240     if (tp->tg3_flags3 & TG3_FLG3_CLKREQ_BUG) {
03241         u16 oldlnkctl, newlnkctl;
03242 
03243         pci_read_config_word(tp->pdev,
03244                      tp->pcie_cap + PCI_EXP_LNKCTL,
03245                      &oldlnkctl);
03246         if (tp->link_config.active_speed == SPEED_100 ||
03247             tp->link_config.active_speed == SPEED_10)
03248             newlnkctl = oldlnkctl & ~PCI_EXP_LNKCTL_CLKREQ_EN;
03249         else
03250             newlnkctl = oldlnkctl | PCI_EXP_LNKCTL_CLKREQ_EN;
03251         if (newlnkctl != oldlnkctl)
03252             pci_write_config_word(tp->pdev,
03253                           tp->pcie_cap + PCI_EXP_LNKCTL,
03254                           newlnkctl);
03255     } else if (tp->tg3_flags3 & TG3_FLG3_TOGGLE_10_100_L1PLLPD) {
03256         u32 newreg, oldreg = tr32(TG3_PCIE_LNKCTL);
03257         if (tp->link_config.active_speed == SPEED_100 ||
03258             tp->link_config.active_speed == SPEED_10)
03259             newreg = oldreg & ~TG3_PCIE_LNKCTL_L1_PLL_PD_EN;
03260         else
03261             newreg = oldreg | TG3_PCIE_LNKCTL_L1_PLL_PD_EN;
03262         if (newreg != oldreg)
03263             tw32(TG3_PCIE_LNKCTL, newreg);
03264     }
03265 
03266     if (current_link_up != netif_carrier_ok(tp->dev)) {
03267         if (current_link_up)
03268             netif_carrier_on(tp->dev);
03269         else
03270             netif_carrier_off(tp->dev);
03271         tg3_link_report(tp);
03272     }
03273 
03274     return 0;
03275 }
03276 
03277 struct tg3_fiber_aneginfo {
03278     int state;
03279 #define ANEG_STATE_UNKNOWN      0
03280 #define ANEG_STATE_AN_ENABLE        1
03281 #define ANEG_STATE_RESTART_INIT     2
03282 #define ANEG_STATE_RESTART      3
03283 #define ANEG_STATE_DISABLE_LINK_OK  4
03284 #define ANEG_STATE_ABILITY_DETECT_INIT  5
03285 #define ANEG_STATE_ABILITY_DETECT   6
03286 #define ANEG_STATE_ACK_DETECT_INIT  7
03287 #define ANEG_STATE_ACK_DETECT       8
03288 #define ANEG_STATE_COMPLETE_ACK_INIT    9
03289 #define ANEG_STATE_COMPLETE_ACK     10
03290 #define ANEG_STATE_IDLE_DETECT_INIT 11
03291 #define ANEG_STATE_IDLE_DETECT      12
03292 #define ANEG_STATE_LINK_OK      13
03293 #define ANEG_STATE_NEXT_PAGE_WAIT_INIT  14
03294 #define ANEG_STATE_NEXT_PAGE_WAIT   15
03295 
03296     u32 flags;
03297 #define MR_AN_ENABLE        0x00000001
03298 #define MR_RESTART_AN       0x00000002
03299 #define MR_AN_COMPLETE      0x00000004
03300 #define MR_PAGE_RX      0x00000008
03301 #define MR_NP_LOADED        0x00000010
03302 #define MR_TOGGLE_TX        0x00000020
03303 #define MR_LP_ADV_FULL_DUPLEX   0x00000040
03304 #define MR_LP_ADV_HALF_DUPLEX   0x00000080
03305 #define MR_LP_ADV_SYM_PAUSE 0x00000100
03306 #define MR_LP_ADV_ASYM_PAUSE    0x00000200
03307 #define MR_LP_ADV_REMOTE_FAULT1 0x00000400
03308 #define MR_LP_ADV_REMOTE_FAULT2 0x00000800
03309 #define MR_LP_ADV_NEXT_PAGE 0x00001000
03310 #define MR_TOGGLE_RX        0x00002000
03311 #define MR_NP_RX        0x00004000
03312 
03313 #define MR_LINK_OK      0x80000000
03314 
03315     unsigned long link_time, cur_time;
03316 
03317     u32 ability_match_cfg;
03318     int ability_match_count;
03319 
03320     char ability_match, idle_match, ack_match;
03321 
03322     u32 txconfig, rxconfig;
03323 #define ANEG_CFG_NP     0x00000080
03324 #define ANEG_CFG_ACK        0x00000040
03325 #define ANEG_CFG_RF2        0x00000020
03326 #define ANEG_CFG_RF1        0x00000010
03327 #define ANEG_CFG_PS2        0x00000001
03328 #define ANEG_CFG_PS1        0x00008000
03329 #define ANEG_CFG_HD     0x00004000
03330 #define ANEG_CFG_FD     0x00002000
03331 #define ANEG_CFG_INVAL      0x00001f06
03332 
03333 };
03334 #define ANEG_OK     0
03335 #define ANEG_DONE   1
03336 #define ANEG_TIMER_ENAB 2
03337 #define ANEG_FAILED -1
03338 
03339 #define ANEG_STATE_SETTLE_TIME  10000
03340 
03341 static int tg3_fiber_aneg_smachine(struct tg3 *tp,
03342                    struct tg3_fiber_aneginfo *ap)
03343 {
03344     u16 flowctrl;
03345     unsigned long delta;
03346     u32 rx_cfg_reg;
03347     int ret;
03348 
03349     if (ap->state == ANEG_STATE_UNKNOWN) {
03350         ap->rxconfig = 0;
03351         ap->link_time = 0;
03352         ap->cur_time = 0;
03353         ap->ability_match_cfg = 0;
03354         ap->ability_match_count = 0;
03355         ap->ability_match = 0;
03356         ap->idle_match = 0;
03357         ap->ack_match = 0;
03358     }
03359     ap->cur_time++;
03360 
03361     if (tr32(MAC_STATUS) & MAC_STATUS_RCVD_CFG) {
03362         rx_cfg_reg = tr32(MAC_RX_AUTO_NEG);
03363 
03364         if (rx_cfg_reg != ap->ability_match_cfg) {
03365             ap->ability_match_cfg = rx_cfg_reg;
03366             ap->ability_match = 0;
03367             ap->ability_match_count = 0;
03368         } else {
03369             if (++ap->ability_match_count > 1) {
03370                 ap->ability_match = 1;
03371                 ap->ability_match_cfg = rx_cfg_reg;
03372             }
03373         }
03374         if (rx_cfg_reg & ANEG_CFG_ACK)
03375             ap->ack_match = 1;
03376         else
03377             ap->ack_match = 0;
03378 
03379         ap->idle_match = 0;
03380     } else {
03381         ap->idle_match = 1;
03382         ap->ability_match_cfg = 0;
03383         ap->ability_match_count = 0;
03384         ap->ability_match = 0;
03385         ap->ack_match = 0;
03386 
03387         rx_cfg_reg = 0;
03388     }
03389 
03390     ap->rxconfig = rx_cfg_reg;
03391     ret = ANEG_OK;
03392 
03393     switch(ap->state) {
03394     case ANEG_STATE_UNKNOWN:
03395         if (ap->flags & (MR_AN_ENABLE | MR_RESTART_AN))
03396             ap->state = ANEG_STATE_AN_ENABLE;
03397 
03398         /* fallthru */
03399     case ANEG_STATE_AN_ENABLE:
03400         ap->flags &= ~(MR_AN_COMPLETE | MR_PAGE_RX);
03401         if (ap->flags & MR_AN_ENABLE) {
03402             ap->link_time = 0;
03403             ap->cur_time = 0;
03404             ap->ability_match_cfg = 0;
03405             ap->ability_match_count = 0;
03406             ap->ability_match = 0;
03407             ap->idle_match = 0;
03408             ap->ack_match = 0;
03409 
03410             ap->state = ANEG_STATE_RESTART_INIT;
03411         } else {
03412             ap->state = ANEG_STATE_DISABLE_LINK_OK;
03413         }
03414         break;
03415 
03416     case ANEG_STATE_RESTART_INIT:
03417         ap->link_time = ap->cur_time;
03418         ap->flags &= ~(MR_NP_LOADED);
03419         ap->txconfig = 0;
03420         tw32(MAC_TX_AUTO_NEG, 0);
03421         tp->mac_mode |= MAC_MODE_SEND_CONFIGS;
03422         tw32_f(MAC_MODE, tp->mac_mode);
03423         udelay(40);
03424 
03425         ret = ANEG_TIMER_ENAB;
03426         ap->state = ANEG_STATE_RESTART;
03427 
03428         /* fallthru */
03429     case ANEG_STATE_RESTART:
03430         delta = ap->cur_time - ap->link_time;
03431         if (delta > ANEG_STATE_SETTLE_TIME) {
03432             ap->state = ANEG_STATE_ABILITY_DETECT_INIT;
03433         } else {
03434             ret = ANEG_TIMER_ENAB;
03435         }
03436         break;
03437 
03438     case ANEG_STATE_DISABLE_LINK_OK:
03439         ret = ANEG_DONE;
03440         break;
03441 
03442     case ANEG_STATE_ABILITY_DETECT_INIT:
03443         ap->flags &= ~(MR_TOGGLE_TX);
03444         ap->txconfig = ANEG_CFG_FD;
03445         flowctrl = tg3_advert_flowctrl_1000X(tp->link_config.flowctrl);
03446         if (flowctrl & ADVERTISE_1000XPAUSE)
03447             ap->txconfig |= ANEG_CFG_PS1;
03448         if (flowctrl & ADVERTISE_1000XPSE_ASYM)
03449             ap->txconfig |= ANEG_CFG_PS2;
03450         tw32(MAC_TX_AUTO_NEG, ap->txconfig);
03451         tp->mac_mode |= MAC_MODE_SEND_CONFIGS;
03452         tw32_f(MAC_MODE, tp->mac_mode);
03453         udelay(40);
03454 
03455         ap->state = ANEG_STATE_ABILITY_DETECT;
03456         break;
03457 
03458     case ANEG_STATE_ABILITY_DETECT:
03459         if (ap->ability_match != 0 && ap->rxconfig != 0) {
03460             ap->state = ANEG_STATE_ACK_DETECT_INIT;
03461         }
03462         break;
03463 
03464     case ANEG_STATE_ACK_DETECT_INIT:
03465         ap->txconfig |= ANEG_CFG_ACK;
03466         tw32(MAC_TX_AUTO_NEG, ap->txconfig);
03467         tp->mac_mode |= MAC_MODE_SEND_CONFIGS;
03468         tw32_f(MAC_MODE, tp->mac_mode);
03469         udelay(40);
03470 
03471         ap->state = ANEG_STATE_ACK_DETECT;
03472 
03473         /* fallthru */
03474     case ANEG_STATE_ACK_DETECT:
03475         if (ap->ack_match != 0) {
03476             if ((ap->rxconfig & ~ANEG_CFG_ACK) ==
03477                 (ap->ability_match_cfg & ~ANEG_CFG_ACK)) {
03478                 ap->state = ANEG_STATE_COMPLETE_ACK_INIT;
03479             } else {
03480                 ap->state = ANEG_STATE_AN_ENABLE;
03481             }
03482         } else if (ap->ability_match != 0 &&
03483                ap->rxconfig == 0) {
03484             ap->state = ANEG_STATE_AN_ENABLE;
03485         }
03486         break;
03487 
03488     case ANEG_STATE_COMPLETE_ACK_INIT:
03489         if (ap->rxconfig & ANEG_CFG_INVAL) {
03490             ret = ANEG_FAILED;
03491             break;
03492         }
03493         ap->flags &= ~(MR_LP_ADV_FULL_DUPLEX |
03494                    MR_LP_ADV_HALF_DUPLEX |
03495                    MR_LP_ADV_SYM_PAUSE |
03496                    MR_LP_ADV_ASYM_PAUSE |
03497                    MR_LP_ADV_REMOTE_FAULT1 |
03498                    MR_LP_ADV_REMOTE_FAULT2 |
03499                    MR_LP_ADV_NEXT_PAGE |
03500                    MR_TOGGLE_RX |
03501                    MR_NP_RX);
03502         if (ap->rxconfig & ANEG_CFG_FD)
03503             ap->flags |= MR_LP_ADV_FULL_DUPLEX;
03504         if (ap->rxconfig & ANEG_CFG_HD)
03505             ap->flags |= MR_LP_ADV_HALF_DUPLEX;
03506         if (ap->rxconfig & ANEG_CFG_PS1)
03507             ap->flags |= MR_LP_ADV_SYM_PAUSE;
03508         if (ap->rxconfig & ANEG_CFG_PS2)
03509             ap->flags |= MR_LP_ADV_ASYM_PAUSE;
03510         if (ap->rxconfig & ANEG_CFG_RF1)
03511             ap->flags |= MR_LP_ADV_REMOTE_FAULT1;
03512         if (ap->rxconfig & ANEG_CFG_RF2)
03513             ap->flags |= MR_LP_ADV_REMOTE_FAULT2;
03514         if (ap->rxconfig & ANEG_CFG_NP)
03515             ap->flags |= MR_LP_ADV_NEXT_PAGE;
03516 
03517         ap->link_time = ap->cur_time;
03518 
03519         ap->flags ^= (MR_TOGGLE_TX);
03520         if (ap->rxconfig & 0x0008)
03521             ap->flags |= MR_TOGGLE_RX;
03522         if (ap->rxconfig & ANEG_CFG_NP)
03523             ap->flags |= MR_NP_RX;
03524         ap->flags |= MR_PAGE_RX;
03525 
03526         ap->state = ANEG_STATE_COMPLETE_ACK;
03527         ret = ANEG_TIMER_ENAB;
03528         break;
03529 
03530     case ANEG_STATE_COMPLETE_ACK:
03531         if (ap->ability_match != 0 &&
03532             ap->rxconfig == 0) {
03533             ap->state = ANEG_STATE_AN_ENABLE;
03534             break;
03535         }
03536         delta = ap->cur_time - ap->link_time;
03537         if (delta > ANEG_STATE_SETTLE_TIME) {
03538             if (!(ap->flags & (MR_LP_ADV_NEXT_PAGE))) {
03539                 ap->state = ANEG_STATE_IDLE_DETECT_INIT;
03540             } else {
03541                 if ((ap->txconfig & ANEG_CFG_NP) == 0 &&
03542                     !(ap->flags & MR_NP_RX)) {
03543                     ap->state = ANEG_STATE_IDLE_DETECT_INIT;
03544                 } else {
03545                     ret = ANEG_FAILED;
03546                 }
03547             }
03548         }
03549         break;
03550 
03551     case ANEG_STATE_IDLE_DETECT_INIT:
03552         ap->link_time = ap->cur_time;
03553         tp->mac_mode &= ~MAC_MODE_SEND_CONFIGS;
03554         tw32_f(MAC_MODE, tp->mac_mode);
03555         udelay(40);
03556 
03557         ap->state = ANEG_STATE_IDLE_DETECT;
03558         ret = ANEG_TIMER_ENAB;
03559         break;
03560 
03561     case ANEG_STATE_IDLE_DETECT:
03562         if (ap->ability_match != 0 &&
03563             ap->rxconfig == 0) {
03564             ap->state = ANEG_STATE_AN_ENABLE;
03565             break;
03566         }
03567         delta = ap->cur_time - ap->link_time;
03568         if (delta > ANEG_STATE_SETTLE_TIME) {
03569             /* XXX another gem from the Broadcom driver :( */
03570             ap->state = ANEG_STATE_LINK_OK;
03571         }
03572         break;
03573 
03574     case ANEG_STATE_LINK_OK:
03575         ap->flags |= (MR_AN_COMPLETE | MR_LINK_OK);
03576         ret = ANEG_DONE;
03577         break;
03578 
03579     case ANEG_STATE_NEXT_PAGE_WAIT_INIT:
03580         /* ??? unimplemented */
03581         break;
03582 
03583     case ANEG_STATE_NEXT_PAGE_WAIT:
03584         /* ??? unimplemented */
03585         break;
03586 
03587     default:
03588         ret = ANEG_FAILED;
03589         break;
03590     }
03591 
03592     return ret;
03593 }
03594 
03595 static int fiber_autoneg(struct tg3 *tp, u32 *txflags, u32 *rxflags)
03596 {
03597     int res = 0;
03598     struct tg3_fiber_aneginfo aninfo;
03599     int status = ANEG_FAILED;
03600     unsigned int tick;
03601     u32 tmp;
03602 
03603     tw32_f(MAC_TX_AUTO_NEG, 0);
03604 
03605     tmp = tp->mac_mode & ~MAC_MODE_PORT_MODE_MASK;
03606     tw32_f(MAC_MODE, tmp | MAC_MODE_PORT_MODE_GMII);
03607     udelay(40);
03608 
03609     tw32_f(MAC_MODE, tp->mac_mode | MAC_MODE_SEND_CONFIGS);
03610     udelay(40);
03611 
03612     memset(&aninfo, 0, sizeof(aninfo));
03613     aninfo.flags |= MR_AN_ENABLE;
03614     aninfo.state = ANEG_STATE_UNKNOWN;
03615     aninfo.cur_time = 0;
03616     tick = 0;
03617     while (++tick < 195000) {
03618         status = tg3_fiber_aneg_smachine(tp, &aninfo);
03619         if (status == ANEG_DONE || status == ANEG_FAILED)
03620             break;
03621 
03622         udelay(1);
03623     }
03624 
03625     tp->mac_mode &= ~MAC_MODE_SEND_CONFIGS;
03626     tw32_f(MAC_MODE, tp->mac_mode);
03627     udelay(40);
03628 
03629     *txflags = aninfo.txconfig;
03630     *rxflags = aninfo.flags;
03631 
03632     if (status == ANEG_DONE &&
03633         (aninfo.flags & (MR_AN_COMPLETE | MR_LINK_OK |
03634                  MR_LP_ADV_FULL_DUPLEX)))
03635         res = 1;
03636 
03637     return res;
03638 }
03639 
03640 static void tg3_init_bcm8002(struct tg3 *tp)
03641 {
03642     u32 mac_status = tr32(MAC_STATUS);
03643     int i;
03644 
03645     /* Reset when initting first time or we have a link. */
03646     if ((tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_INIT_COMPLETE) &&
03647         !(mac_status & MAC_STATUS_PCS_SYNCED))
03648         return;
03649 
03650     /* Set PLL lock range. */
03651     tg3_writephy(tp, 0x16, 0x8007);
03652 
03653     /* SW reset */
03654     tg3_writephy(tp, MII_BMCR, BMCR_RESET);
03655 
03656     /* Wait for reset to complete. */
03657     /* XXX schedule_timeout() ... */
03658     for (i = 0; i < 500; i++)
03659         udelay(10);
03660 
03661     /* Config mode; select PMA/Ch 1 regs. */
03662     tg3_writephy(tp, 0x10, 0x8411);
03663 
03664     /* Enable auto-lock and comdet, select txclk for tx. */
03665     tg3_writephy(tp, 0x11, 0x0a10);
03666 
03667     tg3_writephy(tp, 0x18, 0x00a0);
03668     tg3_writephy(tp, 0x16, 0x41ff);
03669 
03670     /* Assert and deassert POR. */
03671     tg3_writephy(tp, 0x13, 0x0400);
03672     udelay(40);
03673     tg3_writephy(tp, 0x13, 0x0000);
03674 
03675     tg3_writephy(tp, 0x11, 0x0a50);
03676     udelay(40);
03677     tg3_writephy(tp, 0x11, 0x0a10);
03678 
03679     /* Wait for signal to stabilize */
03680     /* XXX schedule_timeout() ... */
03681     for (i = 0; i < 15000; i++)
03682         udelay(10);
03683 
03684     /* Deselect the channel register so we can read the PHYID
03685      * later.
03686      */
03687     tg3_writephy(tp, 0x10, 0x8011);
03688 }
03689 
03690 static int tg3_setup_fiber_hw_autoneg(struct tg3 *tp, u32 mac_status)
03691 {
03692     u16 flowctrl;
03693     u32 sg_dig_ctrl, sg_dig_status;
03694     u32 serdes_cfg, expected_sg_dig_ctrl;
03695     int workaround, port_a;
03696     int current_link_up;
03697 
03698     serdes_cfg = 0;
03699     expected_sg_dig_ctrl = 0;
03700     workaround = 0;
03701     port_a = 1;
03702     current_link_up = 0;
03703 
03704     if (tp->pci_chip_rev_id != CHIPREV_ID_5704_A0 &&
03705         tp->pci_chip_rev_id != CHIPREV_ID_5704_A1) {
03706         workaround = 1;
03707         if (tr32(TG3PCI_DUAL_MAC_CTRL) & DUAL_MAC_CTRL_ID)
03708             port_a = 0;
03709 
03710         /* preserve bits 0-11,13,14 for signal pre-emphasis */
03711         /* preserve bits 20-23 for voltage regulator */
03712         serdes_cfg = tr32(MAC_SERDES_CFG) & 0x00f06fff;
03713     }
03714 
03715     sg_dig_ctrl = tr32(SG_DIG_CTRL);
03716 
03717     if (tp->link_config.autoneg != AUTONEG_ENABLE) {
03718         if (sg_dig_ctrl & SG_DIG_USING_HW_AUTONEG) {
03719             if (workaround) {
03720                 u32 val = serdes_cfg;
03721 
03722                 if (port_a)
03723                     val |= 0xc010000;
03724                 else
03725                     val |= 0x4010000;
03726                 tw32_f(MAC_SERDES_CFG, val);
03727             }
03728 
03729             tw32_f(SG_DIG_CTRL, SG_DIG_COMMON_SETUP);
03730         }
03731         if (mac_status & MAC_STATUS_PCS_SYNCED) {
03732             tg3_setup_flow_control(tp, 0, 0);
03733             current_link_up = 1;
03734         }
03735         goto out;
03736     }
03737 
03738     /* Want auto-negotiation.  */
03739     expected_sg_dig_ctrl = SG_DIG_USING_HW_AUTONEG | SG_DIG_COMMON_SETUP;
03740 
03741     flowctrl = tg3_advert_flowctrl_1000X(tp->link_config.flowctrl);
03742     if (flowctrl & ADVERTISE_1000XPAUSE)
03743         expected_sg_dig_ctrl |= SG_DIG_PAUSE_CAP;
03744     if (flowctrl & ADVERTISE_1000XPSE_ASYM)
03745         expected_sg_dig_ctrl |= SG_DIG_ASYM_PAUSE;
03746 
03747     if (sg_dig_ctrl != expected_sg_dig_ctrl) {
03748         if ((tp->tg3_flags2 & TG3_FLG2_PARALLEL_DETECT) &&
03749             tp->serdes_counter &&
03750             ((mac_status & (MAC_STATUS_PCS_SYNCED |
03751                     MAC_STATUS_RCVD_CFG)) ==
03752              MAC_STATUS_PCS_SYNCED)) {
03753             tp->serdes_counter--;
03754             current_link_up = 1;
03755             goto out;
03756         }
03757 restart_autoneg:
03758         if (workaround)
03759             tw32_f(MAC_SERDES_CFG, serdes_cfg | 0xc011000);
03760         tw32_f(SG_DIG_CTRL, expected_sg_dig_ctrl | SG_DIG_SOFT_RESET);
03761         udelay(5);
03762         tw32_f(SG_DIG_CTRL, expected_sg_dig_ctrl);
03763 
03764         tp->serdes_counter = SERDES_AN_TIMEOUT_5704S;
03765         tp->tg3_flags2 &= ~TG3_FLG2_PARALLEL_DETECT;
03766     } else if (mac_status & (MAC_STATUS_PCS_SYNCED |
03767                  MAC_STATUS_SIGNAL_DET)) {
03768         sg_dig_status = tr32(SG_DIG_STATUS);
03769         mac_status = tr32(MAC_STATUS);
03770 
03771         if ((sg_dig_status & SG_DIG_AUTONEG_COMPLETE) &&
03772             (mac_status & MAC_STATUS_PCS_SYNCED)) {
03773             u32 local_adv = 0, remote_adv = 0;
03774 
03775             if (sg_dig_ctrl & SG_DIG_PAUSE_CAP)
03776                 local_adv |= ADVERTISE_1000XPAUSE;
03777             if (sg_dig_ctrl & SG_DIG_ASYM_PAUSE)
03778                 local_adv |= ADVERTISE_1000XPSE_ASYM;
03779 
03780             if (sg_dig_status & SG_DIG_PARTNER_PAUSE_CAPABLE)
03781                 remote_adv |= LPA_1000XPAUSE;
03782             if (sg_dig_status & SG_DIG_PARTNER_ASYM_PAUSE)
03783                 remote_adv |= LPA_1000XPAUSE_ASYM;
03784 
03785             tg3_setup_flow_control(tp, local_adv, remote_adv);
03786             current_link_up = 1;
03787             tp->serdes_counter = 0;
03788             tp->tg3_flags2 &= ~TG3_FLG2_PARALLEL_DETECT;
03789         } else if (!(sg_dig_status & SG_DIG_AUTONEG_COMPLETE)) {
03790             if (tp->serdes_counter)
03791                 tp->serdes_counter--;
03792             else {
03793                 if (workaround) {
03794                     u32 val = serdes_cfg;
03795 
03796                     if (port_a)
03797                         val |= 0xc010000;
03798                     else
03799                         val |= 0x4010000;
03800 
03801                     tw32_f(MAC_SERDES_CFG, val);
03802                 }
03803 
03804                 tw32_f(SG_DIG_CTRL, SG_DIG_COMMON_SETUP);
03805                 udelay(40);
03806 
03807                 /* Link parallel detection - link is up */
03808                 /* only if we have PCS_SYNC and not */
03809                 /* receiving config code words */
03810                 mac_status = tr32(MAC_STATUS);
03811                 if ((mac_status & MAC_STATUS_PCS_SYNCED) &&
03812                     !(mac_status & MAC_STATUS_RCVD_CFG)) {
03813                     tg3_setup_flow_control(tp, 0, 0);
03814                     current_link_up = 1;
03815                     tp->tg3_flags2 |=
03816                         TG3_FLG2_PARALLEL_DETECT;
03817                     tp->serdes_counter =
03818                         SERDES_PARALLEL_DET_TIMEOUT;
03819                 } else
03820                     goto restart_autoneg;
03821             }
03822         }
03823     } else {
03824         tp->serdes_counter = SERDES_AN_TIMEOUT_5704S;
03825         tp->tg3_flags2 &= ~TG3_FLG2_PARALLEL_DETECT;
03826     }
03827 
03828 out:
03829     return current_link_up;
03830 }
03831 
03832 static int tg3_setup_fiber_by_hand(struct tg3 *tp, u32 mac_status)
03833 {
03834     int current_link_up = 0;
03835 
03836     if (!(mac_status & MAC_STATUS_PCS_SYNCED))
03837         goto out;
03838 
03839     if (tp->link_config.autoneg == AUTONEG_ENABLE) {
03840         u32 txflags, rxflags;
03841         int i;
03842 
03843         if (fiber_autoneg(tp, &txflags, &rxflags)) {
03844             u32 local_adv = 0, remote_adv = 0;
03845 
03846             if (txflags & ANEG_CFG_PS1)
03847                 local_adv |= ADVERTISE_1000XPAUSE;
03848             if (txflags & ANEG_CFG_PS2)
03849                 local_adv |= ADVERTISE_1000XPSE_ASYM;
03850 
03851             if (rxflags & MR_LP_ADV_SYM_PAUSE)
03852                 remote_adv |= LPA_1000XPAUSE;
03853             if (rxflags & MR_LP_ADV_ASYM_PAUSE)
03854                 remote_adv |= LPA_1000XPAUSE_ASYM;
03855 
03856             tg3_setup_flow_control(tp, local_adv, remote_adv);
03857 
03858             current_link_up = 1;
03859         }
03860         for (i = 0; i < 30; i++) {
03861             udelay(20);
03862             tw32_f(MAC_STATUS,
03863                    (MAC_STATUS_SYNC_CHANGED |
03864                 MAC_STATUS_CFG_CHANGED));
03865             udelay(40);
03866             if ((tr32(MAC_STATUS) &
03867                  (MAC_STATUS_SYNC_CHANGED |
03868                   MAC_STATUS_CFG_CHANGED)) == 0)
03869                 break;
03870         }
03871 
03872         mac_status = tr32(MAC_STATUS);
03873         if (current_link_up == 0 &&
03874             (mac_status & MAC_STATUS_PCS_SYNCED) &&
03875             !(mac_status & MAC_STATUS_RCVD_CFG))
03876             current_link_up = 1;
03877     } else {
03878         tg3_setup_flow_control(tp, 0, 0);
03879 
03880         /* Forcing 1000FD link up. */
03881         current_link_up = 1;
03882 
03883         tw32_f(MAC_MODE, (tp->mac_mode | MAC_MODE_SEND_CONFIGS));
03884         udelay(40);
03885 
03886         tw32_f(MAC_MODE, tp->mac_mode);
03887         udelay(40);
03888     }
03889 
03890 out:
03891     return current_link_up;
03892 }
03893 
03894 static int tg3_setup_fiber_phy(struct tg3 *tp, int force_reset)
03895 {
03896     u32 orig_pause_cfg;
03897     u16 orig_active_speed;
03898     u8 orig_active_duplex;
03899     u32 mac_status;
03900     int current_link_up;
03901     int i;
03902 
03903     orig_pause_cfg = tp->link_config.active_flowctrl;
03904     orig_active_speed = tp->link_config.active_speed;
03905     orig_active_duplex = tp->link_config.active_duplex;
03906 
03907     if (!(tp->tg3_flags2 & TG3_FLG2_HW_AUTONEG) &&
03908         netif_carrier_ok(tp->dev) &&
03909         (tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_INIT_COMPLETE)) {
03910         mac_status = tr32(MAC_STATUS);
03911         mac_status &= (MAC_STATUS_PCS_SYNCED |
03912                    MAC_STATUS_SIGNAL_DET |
03913                    MAC_STATUS_CFG_CHANGED |
03914                    MAC_STATUS_RCVD_CFG);
03915         if (mac_status == (MAC_STATUS_PCS_SYNCED |
03916                    MAC_STATUS_SIGNAL_DET)) {
03917             tw32_f(MAC_STATUS, (MAC_STATUS_SYNC_CHANGED |
03918                         MAC_STATUS_CFG_CHANGED));
03919             return 0;
03920         }
03921     }
03922 
03923     tw32_f(MAC_TX_AUTO_NEG, 0);
03924 
03925     tp->mac_mode &= ~(MAC_MODE_PORT_MODE_MASK | MAC_MODE_HALF_DUPLEX);
03926     tp->mac_mode |= MAC_MODE_PORT_MODE_TBI;
03927     tw32_f(MAC_MODE, tp->mac_mode);
03928     udelay(40);
03929 
03930     if (tp->phy_id == PHY_ID_BCM8002)
03931         tg3_init_bcm8002(tp);
03932 
03933     /* Enable link change event even when serdes polling.  */
03934     tw32_f(MAC_EVENT, MAC_EVENT_LNKSTATE_CHANGED);
03935     udelay(40);
03936 
03937     current_link_up = 0;
03938     mac_status = tr32(MAC_STATUS);
03939 
03940     if (tp->tg3_flags2 & TG3_FLG2_HW_AUTONEG)
03941         current_link_up = tg3_setup_fiber_hw_autoneg(tp, mac_status);
03942     else
03943         current_link_up = tg3_setup_fiber_by_hand(tp, mac_status);
03944 
03945     tp->napi[0].hw_status->status =
03946         (SD_STATUS_UPDATED |
03947          (tp->napi[0].hw_status->status & ~SD_STATUS_LINK_CHG));
03948 
03949     for (i = 0; i < 100; i++) {
03950         tw32_f(MAC_STATUS, (MAC_STATUS_SYNC_CHANGED |
03951                     MAC_STATUS_CFG_CHANGED));
03952         udelay(5);
03953         if ((tr32(MAC_STATUS) & (MAC_STATUS_SYNC_CHANGED |
03954                      MAC_STATUS_CFG_CHANGED |
03955                      MAC_STATUS_LNKSTATE_CHANGED)) == 0)
03956             break;
03957     }
03958 
03959     mac_status = tr32(MAC_STATUS);
03960     if ((mac_status & MAC_STATUS_PCS_SYNCED) == 0) {
03961         current_link_up = 0;
03962         if (tp->link_config.autoneg == AUTONEG_ENABLE &&
03963             tp->serdes_counter == 0) {
03964             tw32_f(MAC_MODE, (tp->mac_mode |
03965                       MAC_MODE_SEND_CONFIGS));
03966             udelay(1);
03967             tw32_f(MAC_MODE, tp->mac_mode);
03968         }
03969     }
03970 
03971     if (current_link_up == 1) {
03972         tp->link_config.active_speed = SPEED_1000;
03973         tp->link_config.active_duplex = DUPLEX_FULL;
03974         tw32(MAC_LED_CTRL, (tp->led_ctrl |
03975                     LED_CTRL_LNKLED_OVERRIDE |
03976                     LED_CTRL_1000MBPS_ON));
03977     } else {
03978         tp->link_config.active_speed = SPEED_INVALID;
03979         tp->link_config.active_duplex = DUPLEX_INVALID;
03980         tw32(MAC_LED_CTRL, (tp->led_ctrl |
03981                     LED_CTRL_LNKLED_OVERRIDE |
03982                     LED_CTRL_TRAFFIC_OVERRIDE));
03983     }
03984 
03985     if (current_link_up != netif_carrier_ok(tp->dev)) {
03986         if (current_link_up)
03987             netif_carrier_on(tp->dev);
03988         else
03989             netif_carrier_off(tp->dev);
03990         tg3_link_report(tp);
03991     } else {
03992         u32 now_pause_cfg = tp->link_config.active_flowctrl;
03993         if (orig_pause_cfg != now_pause_cfg ||
03994             orig_active_speed != tp->link_config.active_speed ||
03995             orig_active_duplex != tp->link_config.active_duplex)
03996             tg3_link_report(tp);
03997     }
03998 
03999     return 0;
04000 }
04001 
04002 static int tg3_setup_fiber_mii_phy(struct tg3 *tp, int force_reset)
04003 {
04004     int current_link_up, err = 0;
04005     u32 bmsr, bmcr;
04006     u16 current_speed;
04007     u8 current_duplex;
04008     u32 local_adv, remote_adv;
04009 
04010     tp->mac_mode |= MAC_MODE_PORT_MODE_GMII;
04011     tw32_f(MAC_MODE, tp->mac_mode);
04012     udelay(40);
04013 
04014     tw32(MAC_EVENT, 0);
04015 
04016     tw32_f(MAC_STATUS,
04017          (MAC_STATUS_SYNC_CHANGED |
04018           MAC_STATUS_CFG_CHANGED |
04019           MAC_STATUS_MI_COMPLETION |
04020           MAC_STATUS_LNKSTATE_CHANGED));
04021     udelay(40);
04022 
04023     if (force_reset)
04024         tg3_phy_reset(tp);
04025 
04026     current_link_up = 0;
04027     current_speed = SPEED_INVALID;
04028     current_duplex = DUPLEX_INVALID;
04029 
04030     err |= tg3_readphy(tp, MII_BMSR, &bmsr);
04031     err |= tg3_readphy(tp, MII_BMSR, &bmsr);
04032     if (GET_ASIC_REV(tp->pci_chip_rev_id) == ASIC_REV_5714) {
04033         if (tr32(MAC_TX_STATUS) & TX_STATUS_LINK_UP)
04034             bmsr |= BMSR_LSTATUS;
04035         else
04036             bmsr &= ~BMSR_LSTATUS;
04037     }
04038 
04039     err |= tg3_readphy(tp, MII_BMCR, &bmcr);
04040 
04041     if ((tp->link_config.autoneg == AUTONEG_ENABLE) && !force_reset &&
04042         (tp->tg3_flags2 & TG3_FLG2_PARALLEL_DETECT)) {
04043         /* do nothing, just check for link up at the end */
04044     } else if (tp->link_config.autoneg == AUTONEG_ENABLE) {
04045         u32 adv, new_adv;
04046 
04047         err |= tg3_readphy(tp, MII_ADVERTISE, &adv);
04048         new_adv = adv & ~(ADVERTISE_1000XFULL | ADVERTISE_1000XHALF |
04049                   ADVERTISE_1000XPAUSE |
04050                   ADVERTISE_1000XPSE_ASYM |
04051                   ADVERTISE_SLCT);
04052 
04053         new_adv |= tg3_advert_flowctrl_1000X(tp->link_config.flowctrl);
04054 
04055         if (tp->link_config.advertising & ADVERTISED_1000baseT_Half)
04056             new_adv |= ADVERTISE_1000XHALF;
04057         if (tp->link_config.advertising & ADVERTISED_1000baseT_Full)
04058             new_adv |= ADVERTISE_1000XFULL;
04059 
04060         if ((new_adv != adv) || !(bmcr & BMCR_ANENABLE)) {
04061             tg3_writephy(tp, MII_ADVERTISE, new_adv);
04062             bmcr |= BMCR_ANENABLE | BMCR_ANRESTART;
04063             tg3_writephy(tp, MII_BMCR, bmcr);
04064 
04065             tw32_f(MAC_EVENT, MAC_EVENT_LNKSTATE_CHANGED);
04066             tp->serdes_counter = SERDES_AN_TIMEOUT_5714S;
04067             tp->tg3_flags2 &= ~TG3_FLG2_PARALLEL_DETECT;
04068 
04069             return err;
04070         }
04071     } else {
04072         u32 new_bmcr;
04073 
04074         bmcr &= ~BMCR_SPEED1000;
04075         new_bmcr = bmcr & ~(BMCR_ANENABLE | BMCR_FULLDPLX);
04076 
04077         if (tp->link_config.duplex == DUPLEX_FULL)
04078             new_bmcr |= BMCR_FULLDPLX;
04079 
04080         if (new_bmcr != bmcr) {
04081             /* BMCR_SPEED1000 is a reserved bit that needs
04082              * to be set on write.
04083              */
04084             new_bmcr |= BMCR_SPEED1000;
04085 
04086             /* Force a linkdown */
04087             if (netif_carrier_ok(tp->dev)) {
04088                 u32 adv;
04089 
04090                 err |= tg3_readphy(tp, MII_ADVERTISE, &adv);
04091                 adv &= ~(ADVERTISE_1000XFULL |
04092                      ADVERTISE_1000XHALF |
04093                      ADVERTISE_SLCT);
04094                 tg3_writephy(tp, MII_ADVERTISE, adv);
04095                 tg3_writephy(tp, MII_BMCR, bmcr |
04096                                BMCR_ANRESTART |
04097                                BMCR_ANENABLE);
04098                 udelay(10);
04099                 netif_carrier_off(tp->dev);
04100             }
04101             tg3_writephy(tp, MII_BMCR, new_bmcr);
04102             bmcr = new_bmcr;
04103             err |= tg3_readphy(tp, MII_BMSR, &bmsr);
04104             err |= tg3_readphy(tp, MII_BMSR, &bmsr);
04105             if (GET_ASIC_REV(tp->pci_chip_rev_id) ==
04106                 ASIC_REV_5714) {
04107                 if (tr32(MAC_TX_STATUS) & TX_STATUS_LINK_UP)
04108                     bmsr |= BMSR_LSTATUS;
04109                 else
04110                     bmsr &= ~BMSR_LSTATUS;
04111             }
04112             tp->tg3_flags2 &= ~TG3_FLG2_PARALLEL_DETECT;
04113         }
04114     }
04115 
04116     if (bmsr & BMSR_LSTATUS) {
04117         current_speed = SPEED_1000;
04118         current_link_up = 1;
04119         if (bmcr & BMCR_FULLDPLX)
04120             current_duplex = DUPLEX_FULL;
04121         else
04122             current_duplex = DUPLEX_HALF;
04123 
04124         local_adv = 0;
04125         remote_adv = 0;
04126 
04127         if (bmcr & BMCR_ANENABLE) {
04128             u32 common;
04129 
04130             err |= tg3_readphy(tp, MII_ADVERTISE, &local_adv);
04131             err |= tg3_readphy(tp, MII_LPA, &remote_adv);
04132             common = local_adv & remote_adv;
04133             if (common & (ADVERTISE_1000XHALF |
04134                       ADVERTISE_1000XFULL)) {
04135                 if (common & ADVERTISE_1000XFULL)
04136                     current_duplex = DUPLEX_FULL;
04137                 else
04138                     current_duplex = DUPLEX_HALF;
04139             }
04140             else
04141                 current_link_up = 0;
04142         }
04143     }
04144 
04145     if (current_link_up == 1 && current_duplex == DUPLEX_FULL)
04146         tg3_setup_flow_control(tp, local_adv, remote_adv);
04147 
04148     tp->mac_mode &= ~MAC_MODE_HALF_DUPLEX;
04149     if (tp->link_config.active_duplex == DUPLEX_HALF)
04150         tp->mac_mode |= MAC_MODE_HALF_DUPLEX;
04151 
04152     tw32_f(MAC_MODE, tp->mac_mode);
04153     udelay(40);
04154 
04155     tw32_f(MAC_EVENT, MAC_EVENT_LNKSTATE_CHANGED);
04156 
04157     tp->link_config.active_speed = current_speed;
04158     tp->link_config.active_duplex = current_duplex;
04159 
04160     if (current_link_up != netif_carrier_ok(tp->dev)) {
04161         if (current_link_up)
04162             netif_carrier_on(tp->dev);
04163         else {
04164             netif_carrier_off(tp->dev);
04165             tp->tg3_flags2 &= ~TG3_FLG2_PARALLEL_DETECT;
04166         }
04167         tg3_link_report(tp);
04168     }
04169     return err;
04170 }
04171 
04172 static void tg3_serdes_parallel_detect(struct tg3 *tp)
04173 {
04174     if (tp->serdes_counter) {
04175         /* Give autoneg time to complete. */
04176         tp->serdes_counter--;
04177         return;
04178     }
04179     if (!netif_carrier_ok(tp->dev) &&
04180         (tp->link_config.autoneg == AUTONEG_ENABLE)) {
04181         u32 bmcr;
04182 
04183         tg3_readphy(tp, MII_BMCR, &bmcr);
04184         if (bmcr & BMCR_ANENABLE) {
04185             u32 phy1, phy2;
04186 
04187             /* Select shadow register 0x1f */
04188             tg3_writephy(tp, 0x1c, 0x7c00);
04189             tg3_readphy(tp, 0x1c, &phy1);
04190 
04191             /* Select expansion interrupt status register */
04192             tg3_writephy(tp, 0x17, 0x0f01);
04193             tg3_readphy(tp, 0x15, &phy2);
04194             tg3_readphy(tp, 0x15, &phy2);
04195 
04196             if ((phy1 & 0x10) && !(phy2 & 0x20)) {
04197                 /* We have signal detect and not receiving
04198                  * config code words, link is up by parallel
04199                  * detection.
04200                  */
04201 
04202                 bmcr &= ~BMCR_ANENABLE;
04203                 bmcr |= BMCR_SPEED1000 | BMCR_FULLDPLX;
04204                 tg3_writephy(tp, MII_BMCR, bmcr);
04205                 tp->tg3_flags2 |= TG3_FLG2_PARALLEL_DETECT;
04206             }
04207         }
04208     }
04209     else if (netif_carrier_ok(tp->dev) &&
04210          (tp->link_config.autoneg == AUTONEG_ENABLE) &&
04211          (tp->tg3_flags2 & TG3_FLG2_PARALLEL_DETECT)) {
04212         u32 phy2;
04213 
04214         /* Select expansion interrupt status register */
04215         tg3_writephy(tp, 0x17, 0x0f01);
04216         tg3_readphy(tp, 0x15, &phy2);
04217         if (phy2 & 0x20) {
04218             u32 bmcr;
04219 
04220             /* Config code words received, turn on autoneg. */
04221             tg3_readphy(tp, MII_BMCR, &bmcr);
04222             tg3_writephy(tp, MII_BMCR, bmcr | BMCR_ANENABLE);
04223 
04224             tp->tg3_flags2 &= ~TG3_FLG2_PARALLEL_DETECT;
04225 
04226         }
04227     }
04228 }
04229 
04230 static int tg3_setup_phy(struct tg3 *tp, int force_reset)
04231 {
04232     int err;
04233 
04234     if (tp->tg3_flags2 & TG3_FLG2_PHY_SERDES) {
04235         err = tg3_setup_fiber_phy(tp, force_reset);
04236     } else if (tp->tg3_flags2 & TG3_FLG2_MII_SERDES) {
04237         err = tg3_setup_fiber_mii_phy(tp, force_reset);
04238     } else {
04239         err = tg3_setup_copper_phy(tp, force_reset);
04240     }
04241 
04242     if (GET_CHIP_REV(tp->pci_chip_rev_id) == CHIPREV_5784_AX) {
04243         u32 val, scale;
04244 
04245         val = tr32(TG3_CPMU_CLCK_STAT) & CPMU_CLCK_STAT_MAC_CLCK_MASK;
04246         if (val == CPMU_CLCK_STAT_MAC_CLCK_62_5)
04247             scale = 65;
04248         else if (val == CPMU_CLCK_STAT_MAC_CLCK_6_25)
04249             scale = 6;
04250         else
04251             scale = 12;
04252 
04253         val = tr32(GRC_MISC_CFG) & ~GRC_MISC_CFG_PRESCALAR_MASK;
04254         val |= (scale << GRC_MISC_CFG_PRESCALAR_SHIFT);
04255         tw32(GRC_MISC_CFG, val);
04256     }
04257 
04258     if (tp->link_config.active_speed == SPEED_1000 &&
04259         tp->link_config.active_duplex == DUPLEX_HALF)
04260         tw32(MAC_TX_LENGTHS,
04261              ((2 << TX_LENGTHS_IPG_CRS_SHIFT) |
04262               (6 << TX_LENGTHS_IPG_SHIFT) |
04263               (0xff << TX_LENGTHS_SLOT_TIME_SHIFT)));
04264     else
04265         tw32(MAC_TX_LENGTHS,
04266              ((2 << TX_LENGTHS_IPG_CRS_SHIFT) |
04267               (6 << TX_LENGTHS_IPG_SHIFT) |
04268               (32 << TX_LENGTHS_SLOT_TIME_SHIFT)));
04269 
04270     if (!(tp->tg3_flags2 & TG3_FLG2_5705_PLUS)) {
04271         if (netif_carrier_ok(tp->dev)) {
04272             tw32(HOSTCC_STAT_COAL_TICKS,
04273                  tp->coal.stats_block_coalesce_usecs);
04274         } else {
04275             tw32(HOSTCC_STAT_COAL_TICKS, 0);
04276         }
04277     }
04278 
04279     if (tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_ASPM_WORKAROUND) {
04280         u32 val = tr32(PCIE_PWR_MGMT_THRESH);
04281         if (!netif_carrier_ok(tp->dev))
04282             val = (val & ~PCIE_PWR_MGMT_L1_THRESH_MSK) |
04283                   tp->pwrmgmt_thresh;
04284         else
04285             val |= PCIE_PWR_MGMT_L1_THRESH_MSK;
04286         tw32(PCIE_PWR_MGMT_THRESH, val);
04287     }
04288 
04289     return err;
04290 }
04291 
04292 /* This is called whenever we suspect that the system chipset is re-
04293  * ordering the sequence of MMIO to the tx send mailbox. The symptom
04294  * is bogus tx completions. We try to recover by setting the
04295  * TG3_FLAG_MBOX_WRITE_REORDER flag and resetting the chip later
04296  * in the workqueue.
04297  */
04298 static void tg3_tx_recover(struct tg3 *tp)
04299 {
04300     BUG_ON((tp->tg3_flags & TG3_FLAG_MBOX_WRITE_REORDER) ||
04301            tp->write32_tx_mbox == tg3_write_indirect_mbox);
04302 
04303     printk(KERN_WARNING PFX "%s: The system may be re-ordering memory-"
04304            "mapped I/O cycles to the network device, attempting to "
04305            "recover. Please report the problem to the driver maintainer "
04306            "and include system chipset information.\n", tp->dev->name);
04307 
04308     spin_lock(&tp->lock);
04309     tp->tg3_flags |= TG3_FLAG_TX_RECOVERY_PENDING;
04310     spin_unlock(&tp->lock);
04311 }
04312 
04313 static inline u32 tg3_tx_avail(struct tg3_napi *tnapi)
04314 {
04315     smp_mb();
04316     return tnapi->tx_pending -
04317            ((tnapi->tx_prod - tnapi->tx_cons) & (TG3_TX_RING_SIZE - 1));
04318 }
04319 
04320 /* Tigon3 never reports partial packet sends.  So we do not
04321  * need special logic to handle SKBs that have not had all
04322  * of their frags sent yet, like SunGEM does.
04323  */
04324 static void tg3_tx(struct tg3_napi *tnapi)
04325 {
04326     struct tg3 *tp = tnapi->tp;
04327     u32 hw_idx = tnapi->hw_status->idx[0].tx_consumer;
04328     u32 sw_idx = tnapi->tx_cons;
04329     struct netdev_queue *txq;
04330     int index = tnapi - tp->napi;
04331 
04332     if (tp->tg3_flags2 & TG3_FLG2_USING_MSIX)
04333         index--;
04334 
04335     txq = netdev_get_tx_queue(tp->dev, index);
04336 
04337     while (sw_idx != hw_idx) {
04338         struct tx_ring_info *ri = &tnapi->tx_buffers[sw_idx];
04339         struct sk_buff *skb = ri->skb;
04340         int i, tx_bug = 0;
04341 
04342         if (unlikely(skb == NULL)) {
04343             tg3_tx_recover(tp);
04344             return;
04345         }
04346 
04347         skb_dma_unmap(&tp->pdev->dev, skb, DMA_TO_DEVICE);
04348 
04349         ri->skb = NULL;
04350 
04351         sw_idx = NEXT_TX(sw_idx);
04352 
04353         for (i = 0; i < skb_shinfo(skb)->nr_frags; i++) {
04354             ri = &tnapi->tx_buffers[sw_idx];
04355             if (unlikely(ri->skb != NULL || sw_idx == hw_idx))
04356                 tx_bug = 1;
04357             sw_idx = NEXT_TX(sw_idx);
04358         }
04359 
04360         dev_kfree_skb(skb);
04361 
04362         if (unlikely(tx_bug)) {
04363             tg3_tx_recover(tp);
04364             return;
04365         }
04366     }
04367 
04368     tnapi->tx_cons = sw_idx;
04369 
04370     /* Need to make the tx_cons update visible to tg3_start_xmit()
04371      * before checking for netif_queue_stopped().  Without the
04372      * memory barrier, there is a small possibility that tg3_start_xmit()
04373      * will miss it and cause the queue to be stopped forever.
04374      */
04375     smp_mb();
04376 
04377     if (unlikely(netif_tx_queue_stopped(txq) &&
04378              (tg3_tx_avail(tnapi) > TG3_TX_WAKEUP_THRESH(tnapi)))) {
04379         __netif_tx_lock(txq, smp_processor_id());
04380         if (netif_tx_queue_stopped(txq) &&
04381             (tg3_tx_avail(tnapi) > TG3_TX_WAKEUP_THRESH(tnapi)))
04382             netif_tx_wake_queue(txq);
04383         __netif_tx_unlock(txq);
04384     }
04385 }
04386 
04387 /* Returns size of skb allocated or < 0 on error.
04388  *
04389  * We only need to fill in the address because the other members
04390  * of the RX descriptor are invariant, see tg3_init_rings.
04391  *
04392  * Note the purposeful assymetry of cpu vs. chip accesses.  For
04393  * posting buffers we only dirty the first cache line of the RX
04394  * descriptor (containing the address).  Whereas for the RX status
04395  * buffers the cpu only reads the last cacheline of the RX descriptor
04396  * (to fetch the error flags, vlan tag, checksum, and opaque cookie).
04397  */
04398 static int tg3_alloc_rx_skb(struct tg3_napi *tnapi, u32 opaque_key,
04399                 int src_idx, u32 dest_idx_unmasked)
04400 {
04401     struct tg3 *tp = tnapi->tp;
04402     struct tg3_rx_buffer_desc *desc;
04403     struct ring_info *map, *src_map;
04404     struct sk_buff *skb;
04405     dma_addr_t mapping;
04406     int skb_size, dest_idx;
04407     struct tg3_rx_prodring_set *tpr = &tp->prodring[0];
04408 
04409     src_map = NULL;
04410     switch (opaque_key) {
04411     case RXD_OPAQUE_RING_STD:
04412         dest_idx = dest_idx_unmasked % TG3_RX_RING_SIZE;
04413         desc = &tpr->rx_std[dest_idx];
04414         map = &tpr->rx_std_buffers[dest_idx];
04415         if (src_idx >= 0)
04416             src_map = &tpr->rx_std_buffers[src_idx];
04417         skb_size = tp->rx_pkt_map_sz;
04418         break;
04419 
04420     case RXD_OPAQUE_RING_JUMBO:
04421         dest_idx = dest_idx_unmasked % TG3_RX_JUMBO_RING_SIZE;
04422         desc = &tpr->rx_jmb[dest_idx].std;
04423         map = &tpr->rx_jmb_buffers[dest_idx];
04424         if (src_idx >= 0)
04425             src_map = &tpr->rx_jmb_buffers[src_idx];
04426         skb_size = TG3_RX_JMB_MAP_SZ;
04427         break;
04428 
04429     default:
04430         return -EINVAL;
04431     }
04432 
04433     /* Do not overwrite any of the map or rp information
04434      * until we are sure we can commit to a new buffer.
04435      *
04436      * Callers depend upon this behavior and assume that
04437      * we leave everything unchanged if we fail.
04438      */
04439     skb = netdev_alloc_skb(tp->dev, skb_size + tp->rx_offset);
04440     if (skb == NULL)
04441         return -ENOMEM;
04442 
04443     skb_reserve(skb, tp->rx_offset);
04444 
04445     mapping = pci_map_single(tp->pdev, skb->data, skb_size,
04446                  PCI_DMA_FROMDEVICE);
04447 
04448     map->skb = skb;
04449     pci_unmap_addr_set(map, mapping, mapping);
04450 
04451     if (src_map != NULL)
04452         src_map->skb = NULL;
04453 
04454     desc->addr_hi = ((u64)mapping >> 32);
04455     desc->addr_lo = ((u64)mapping & 0xffffffff);
04456 
04457     return skb_size;
04458 }
04459 
04460 /* We only need to move over in the address because the other
04461  * members of the RX descriptor are invariant.  See notes above
04462  * tg3_alloc_rx_skb for full details.
04463  */
04464 static void tg3_recycle_rx(struct tg3_napi *tnapi, u32 opaque_key,
04465                int src_idx, u32 dest_idx_unmasked)
04466 {
04467     struct tg3 *tp = tnapi->tp;
04468     struct tg3_rx_buffer_desc *src_desc, *dest_desc;
04469     struct ring_info *src_map, *dest_map;
04470     int dest_idx;
04471     struct tg3_rx_prodring_set *tpr = &tp->prodring[0];
04472 
04473     switch (opaque_key) {
04474     case RXD_OPAQUE_RING_STD:
04475         dest_idx = dest_idx_unmasked % TG3_RX_RING_SIZE;
04476         dest_desc = &tpr->rx_std[dest_idx];
04477         dest_map = &tpr->rx_std_buffers[dest_idx];
04478         src_desc = &tpr->rx_std[src_idx];
04479         src_map = &tpr->rx_std_buffers[src_idx];
04480         break;
04481 
04482     case RXD_OPAQUE_RING_JUMBO:
04483         dest_idx = dest_idx_unmasked % TG3_RX_JUMBO_RING_SIZE;
04484         dest_desc = &tpr->rx_jmb[dest_idx].std;
04485         dest_map = &tpr->rx_jmb_buffers[dest_idx];
04486         src_desc = &tpr->rx_jmb[src_idx].std;
04487         src_map = &tpr->rx_jmb_buffers[src_idx];
04488         break;
04489 
04490     default:
04491         return;
04492     }
04493 
04494     dest_map->skb = src_map->skb;
04495     pci_unmap_addr_set(dest_map, mapping,
04496                pci_unmap_addr(src_map, mapping));
04497     dest_desc->addr_hi = src_desc->addr_hi;
04498     dest_desc->addr_lo = src_desc->addr_lo;
04499 
04500     src_map->skb = NULL;
04501 }
04502 
04503 /* The RX ring scheme is composed of multiple rings which post fresh
04504  * buffers to the chip, and one special ring the chip uses to report
04505  * status back to the host.
04506  *
04507  * The special ring reports the status of received packets to the
04508  * host.  The chip does not write into the original descriptor the
04509  * RX buffer was obtained from.  The chip simply takes the original
04510  * descriptor as provided by the host, updates the status and length
04511  * field, then writes this into the next status ring entry.
04512  *
04513  * Each ring the host uses to post buffers to the chip is described
04514  * by a TG3_BDINFO entry in the chips SRAM area.  When a packet arrives,
04515  * it is first placed into the on-chip ram.  When the packet's length
04516  * is known, it walks down the TG3_BDINFO entries to select the ring.
04517  * Each TG3_BDINFO specifies a MAXLEN field and the first TG3_BDINFO
04518  * which is within the range of the new packet's length is chosen.
04519  *
04520  * The "separate ring for rx status" scheme may sound queer, but it makes
04521  * sense from a cache coherency perspective.  If only the host writes
04522  * to the buffer post rings, and only the chip writes to the rx status
04523  * rings, then cache lines never move beyond shared-modified state.
04524  * If both the host and chip were to write into the same ring, cache line
04525  * eviction could occur since both entities want it in an exclusive state.
04526  */
04527 static int tg3_rx(struct tg3_napi *tnapi, int budget)
04528 {
04529     struct tg3 *tp = tnapi->tp;
04530     u32 work_mask, rx_std_posted = 0;
04531     u32 sw_idx = tnapi->rx_rcb_ptr;
04532     u16 hw_idx;
04533     int received;
04534     struct tg3_rx_prodring_set *tpr = &tp->prodring[0];
04535 
04536     hw_idx = *(tnapi->rx_rcb_prod_idx);
04537     /*
04538      * We need to order the read of hw_idx and the read of
04539      * the opaque cookie.
04540      */
04541     rmb();
04542     work_mask = 0;
04543     received = 0;
04544     while (sw_idx != hw_idx && budget > 0) {
04545         struct tg3_rx_buffer_desc *desc = &tnapi->rx_rcb[sw_idx];
04546         unsigned int len;
04547         struct sk_buff *skb;
04548         dma_addr_t dma_addr;
04549         u32 opaque_key, desc_idx, *post_ptr;
04550 
04551         desc_idx = desc->opaque & RXD_OPAQUE_INDEX_MASK;
04552         opaque_key = desc->opaque & RXD_OPAQUE_RING_MASK;
04553         if (opaque_key == RXD_OPAQUE_RING_STD) {
04554             struct ring_info *ri = &tpr->rx_std_buffers[desc_idx];
04555             dma_addr = pci_unmap_addr(ri, mapping);
04556             skb = ri->skb;
04557             post_ptr = &tpr->rx_std_ptr;
04558             rx_std_posted++;
04559         } else if (opaque_key == RXD_OPAQUE_RING_JUMBO) {
04560             struct ring_info *ri = &tpr->rx_jmb_buffers[desc_idx];
04561             dma_addr = pci_unmap_addr(ri, mapping);
04562             skb = ri->skb;
04563             post_ptr = &tpr->rx_jmb_ptr;
04564         } else
04565             goto next_pkt_nopost;
04566 
04567         work_mask |= opaque_key;
04568 
04569         if ((desc->err_vlan & RXD_ERR_MASK) != 0 &&
04570             (desc->err_vlan != RXD_ERR_ODD_NIBBLE_RCVD_MII)) {
04571         drop_it:
04572             tg3_recycle_rx(tnapi, opaque_key,
04573                        desc_idx, *post_ptr);
04574         drop_it_no_recycle:
04575             /* Other statistics kept track of by card. */
04576             tp->net_stats.rx_dropped++;
04577             goto next_pkt;
04578         }
04579 
04580         len = ((desc->idx_len & RXD_LEN_MASK) >> RXD_LEN_SHIFT) -
04581               ETH_FCS_LEN;
04582 
04583         if (len > RX_COPY_THRESHOLD
04584             && tp->rx_offset == NET_IP_ALIGN
04585             /* rx_offset will likely not equal NET_IP_ALIGN
04586              * if this is a 5701 card running in PCI-X mode
04587              * [see tg3_get_invariants()]
04588              */
04589         ) {
04590             int skb_size;
04591 
04592             skb_size = tg3_alloc_rx_skb(tnapi, opaque_key,
04593                             desc_idx, *post_ptr);
04594             if (skb_size < 0)
04595                 goto drop_it;
04596 
04597             pci_unmap_single(tp->pdev, dma_addr, skb_size,
04598                      PCI_DMA_FROMDEVICE);
04599 
04600             skb_put(skb, len);
04601         } else {
04602             struct sk_buff *copy_skb;
04603 
04604             tg3_recycle_rx(tnapi, opaque_key,
04605                        desc_idx, *post_ptr);
04606 
04607             copy_skb = netdev_alloc_skb(tp->dev,
04608                             len + TG3_RAW_IP_ALIGN);
04609             if (copy_skb == NULL)
04610                 goto drop_it_no_recycle;
04611
